search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Iterable (iterable.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: Iterable does not have a direct pricing page listed on its site according to the search results. You may need to contact their sales team for pricing details on their official website at [Iterable.com](https://iterable.com). Let me know if I can assist further!

Stop guessing. Start delivering.
--------------------------------

### Increase Purchase Frequency

Turn one-time buyers into loyal customers with automated journeys that reward engagement and drive action.

![Image 113: brand-logo](https://iterable.com/wp-content/themes/itbl/assets/images/dist/facelift/results-logo-jerseymikes.svg)

[**Jersey Mike's**](https://iterable.com/customers/jersey-mikes/) saw a **13% lift** in purchase frequency

### Drive More Engagement

Leverage real-time behavioral data to deliver personalized moments that capture attention and spark interaction.

![Image 114: brand-logo](https://iterable.com/wp-content/themes/itbl/assets/images/dist/facelift/results-logo-theathletic.svg)

[**The Athletic**](https://iterable.com/customers/the-athletic/) drove a **127% boost** in email click rates.

### Accelerate Upsell

Surface timely, relevant opportunities that fuel expansion, adoption, and incremental value across channels.

![Image 115: brand-logo](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

[**Thirty Madison**](https://iterable.com/customers/thirty-madison/) saw a **50% lift** in converted subscribers

Today’s ideas for tomorrow’s marketers
--------------------------------------

![Image 117: Martech meeting](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

Featured

9 min read

### [The Future of MarTech is Composable](https://iterable.com/whitepaper/the-future-of-martech-is-composable/)

How to power customer engagement with data through faster insights, smarter personalization, and scalable execution.

Cross-channel

7 min read

CX

Turn one-time buyers into loyal fans with agile tech, AI-fueled journeys and real-time relevance.

![Image 121: AI Powered Marketing](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

AI

10 min read

Dive into how AI is reshaping marketing workflows, personalization, and customer connection.

Power up your martech stack
---------------------------

Your CRM is an ecosystem—Iterable brings it all together. Maximize your tech stack with seamless integrations that supercharge customer engagement, turning data into action and transactions into lasting connections.

![Image 123](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

![Image 137](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

![Image 139](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)
